member.name: T:Wisej.Web.Ext.ChartJS.ChartType
member.summary: Defines the type of chart rendered by the control.

member.name: F:Wisej.Web.Ext.ChartJS.ChartType.Line
member.summary: A line chart plots data points on a line.

member.name: F:Wisej.Web.Ext.ChartJS.ChartType.Bar
member.summary: A bar chart shows data as bars.

member.name: F:Wisej.Web.Ext.ChartJS.ChartType.HorizontalBar
member.summary: The horizontal bar chart shows data as horizontal bars.

member.name: F:Wisej.Web.Ext.ChartJS.ChartType.Radar
member.summary: The radar chart shows multiple data points and the variation between them.

member.name: F:Wisej.Web.Ext.ChartJS.ChartType.PolarArea
member.summary: Polar area charts are similar to pie charts, but each segment has the same angle - the radius of the segment differs depending on the value.

member.name: F:Wisej.Web.Ext.ChartJS.ChartType.Pie
member.summary: Pie and doughnut charts are probably the most commonly used chart there are. They are divided into segments, the arc of each segment shows the proportional value of each piece of data.

member.name: F:Wisej.Web.Ext.ChartJS.ChartType.Doughnut
member.summary: Pie and doughnut charts are probably the most commonly used chart there are. They are divided into segments, the arc of each segment shows the proportional value of each piece of data.

member.name: F:Wisej.Web.Ext.ChartJS.ChartType.Bubble
member.summary: A bubble chart is used to display three dimensions of data at the same time. The location of the bubble is determined by the first two dimensions and the corresponding horizontal and vertical axes. The third dimension is represented by the size of the individual bubbles.

member.name: F:Wisej.Web.Ext.ChartJS.ChartType.Scatter
member.summary: Scatter charts are based on basic line charts with the x axis changed to a linear axis. To use a scatter chart, data must be passed as objects containing X and Y properties.

member.name: T:Wisej.Web.Ext.ChartJS.DataLabelAlign
member.summary: Alignment configuration for ChartJS datalabel. See: https://chartjs-plugin-datalabels.netlify.app/guide/positioning.html#alignment-and-offset.

member.name: F:Wisej.Web.Ext.ChartJS.DataLabelAlign.Center
member.summary: (default): the label is centered on the anchor point.

member.name: F:Wisej.Web.Ext.ChartJS.DataLabelAlign.Start
member.summary: The label is positioned before the anchor point, following the same direction.

member.name: F:Wisej.Web.Ext.ChartJS.DataLabelAlign.End
member.summary: The label is positioned after the anchor point, following the same direction.

member.name: F:Wisej.Web.Ext.ChartJS.DataLabelAlign.Right
member.summary: The label is positioned to the right of the anchor point (0°).

member.name: F:Wisej.Web.Ext.ChartJS.DataLabelAlign.Bottom
member.summary: The label is positioned to the bottom of the anchor point (90°)

member.name: F:Wisej.Web.Ext.ChartJS.DataLabelAlign.Left
member.summary: The label is positioned to the left of the anchor point (180°)

member.name: F:Wisej.Web.Ext.ChartJS.DataLabelAlign.Top
member.summary: The label is positioned to the top of the anchor point (270°)

member.name: T:Wisej.Web.Ext.ChartJS.DataLabelAnchor
member.summary: Anchor configuration for ChartJS datalabel. See: https://chartjs-plugin-datalabels.netlify.app/guide/positioning.html#anchoring.

member.name: F:Wisej.Web.Ext.ChartJS.DataLabelAnchor.Center
member.summary: (default): element center.

member.name: F:Wisej.Web.Ext.ChartJS.DataLabelAnchor.Start
member.summary: Lowest element boundary

member.name: F:Wisej.Web.Ext.ChartJS.DataLabelAnchor.End
member.summary: Highest element boundary.

member.name: T:Wisej.Web.Ext.ChartJS.DataLabelTextAlignment
member.summary: Specifies the alignment of the text in a data label. See: https://v1_0_0--chartjs-plugin-datalabels.netlify.app/guide/formatting.html#text-alignment.

member.name: F:Wisej.Web.Ext.ChartJS.DataLabelTextAlignment.Start
member.summary: (default): the text is left-aligned.

member.name: F:Wisej.Web.Ext.ChartJS.DataLabelTextAlignment.Center
member.summary: The text is centered.

member.name: F:Wisej.Web.Ext.ChartJS.DataLabelTextAlignment.End
member.summary: The text is right-aligned.

member.summary: Specialized data set for the chart.

member.name: M:Wisej.Web.Ext.ChartJS.LineDataSet.#ctor
member.summary: Constructs a new instance of .

member.name: P:Wisej.Web.Ext.ChartJS.LineDataSet.BorderColor
member.summary: The color of the line.

member.name: P:Wisej.Web.Ext.ChartJS.LineDataSet.BorderDash
member.summary: Length and spacing of dashes. See https://developer.mozilla.org/en-US/docs/Web/API/CanvasRenderingContext2D/setLineDash.

member.name: P:Wisej.Web.Ext.ChartJS.LineDataSet.Fill
member.summary: If true, fill the area under the line.

member.name: P:Wisej.Web.Ext.ChartJS.LineDataSet.ShowLine
member.summary: If false lines between points are not drawn.

member.name: P:Wisej.Web.Ext.ChartJS.LineDataSet.SpanGaps
member.summary: If true, lines will be drawn between points with no or null data. If false, points with NaN data will create a break in the line

member.name: P:Wisej.Web.Ext.ChartJS.LineDataSet.SteppedLine
member.summary: If true, show the line.

member.name: P:Wisej.Web.Ext.ChartJS.LineDataSet.PointStyle
member.summary: The style of a point on the line.One entry is the default for all points, otherwise each point can define a style.

member.name: P:Wisej.Web.Ext.ChartJS.LineDataSet.PointRadius
member.summary: The radius of the point shape. If set to 0, nothing is rendered.One entry is the default radius for all points, otherwise each point can define a radius.

member.name: P:Wisej.Web.Ext.ChartJS.LineDataSet.PointHoverRadius
member.summary: The radius of the point when hovered. One entry is the default hover radius for all points, otherwise each point can define a hover radius.

member.name: P:Wisej.Web.Ext.ChartJS.LineDataSet.PointBackgroundColor
member.summary: The fill colors of the points in the data set. One entry is the default color for all the points, otherwise each point can be defined as a different color.

member.name: P:Wisej.Web.Ext.ChartJS.LineDataSet.PointBorderColor
member.summary: The border colors of the points in the data set. One entry is the default color for all the points, otherwise each point can be defined as a different color.

member.name: P:Wisej.Web.Ext.ChartJS.LineDataSet.LineTension
member.summary: Bezier curve tension of the line. Set to 0 to draw straight lines. This option is ignored if monotone cubic interpolation is used.

member.name: T:Wisej.Web.Ext.ChartJS.BarDataSet
member.summary: Specialized data set for the chart.

member.summary: Constructs a new instance of .

member.summary: The fill colors of the data set. One entry is the default color for all the bars, otherwise each bar can define a different color.

member.name: P:Wisej.Web.Ext.ChartJS.BarDataSet.BorderColor
member.summary: The border colors of the data set. One entry is the default color for all the bars, otherwise each bar can define a different color for each bar.

member.name: P:Wisej.Web.Ext.ChartJS.BarDataSet.HoverBackgroundColor
member.summary: The hover colors of the data set. One entry is the default color for all the slices, otherwise each slice can define a different hover background color.

member.name: T:Wisej.Web.Ext.ChartJS.OptionsAxisGridLines
member.summary: Specifies the grid line configuration for each axis.

member.name: M:Wisej.Web.Ext.ChartJS.OptionsAxisGridLines.#ctor
member.summary: Default constructor.

member.name: M:Wisej.Web.Ext.ChartJS.OptionsAxisGridLines.#ctor(Wisej.Web.Ext.ChartJS.OptionsBase)
member.summary: Constructs a new instance of the set.
member.param: The that owns this set of options.

member.name: P:Wisej.Web.Ext.ChartJS.OptionsAxisGridLines.BorderDash
member.summary: Length and spacing of dashes on grid lines. See https://developer.mozilla.org/en-US/docs/Web/API/CanvasRenderingContext2D/setLineDash.

member.name: P:Wisej.Web.Ext.ChartJS.OptionsAxisGridLines.BorderDashOffset
member.summary: Offset for line dashes. See https://developer.mozilla.org/en-US/docs/Web/API/CanvasRenderingContext2D/lineDashOffset.

member.name: P:Wisej.Web.Ext.ChartJS.OptionsAxisGridLines.Circular
member.summary: If true, grid lines are circular (on radar chart only).

member.name: P:Wisej.Web.Ext.ChartJS.OptionsAxisGridLines.Color
member.summary: The colors of the grid lines.
member.remarks: If specified as an array, the first color applies to the first grid line, the second to the second grid line and so on.

member.name: P:Wisej.Web.Ext.ChartJS.OptionsAxisGridLines.Display
member.summary: Shows or hides the grid lines for the specified axis.

member.name: P:Wisej.Web.Ext.ChartJS.OptionsAxisGridLines.DrawBorder
member.summary: If true, draw border at the edge between the axis and the chart area.

member.name: P:Wisej.Web.Ext.ChartJS.OptionsAxisGridLines.DrawOnChartArea
member.summary: If true, draw lines on the chart area inside the axis lines.
member.remarks: This is useful when there are multiple axes and you need to control which grid lines are drawn.

member.name: P:Wisej.Web.Ext.ChartJS.OptionsAxisGridLines.DrawTicks
member.summary: If true, draw lines beside the ticks in the axis area beside the chart.

member.name: P:Wisej.Web.Ext.ChartJS.OptionsAxisGridLines.LineWidth
member.summary: Stroke width of grid lines.

member.name: P:Wisej.Web.Ext.ChartJS.OptionsAxisGridLines.OffsetGridLines
member.summary: If true, grid lines will be shifted to be between labels.

member.name: P:Wisej.Web.Ext.ChartJS.OptionsAxisGridLines.TickMarkLength
member.summary: Length in pixels that the grid lines will draw into the axis area.

member.name: P:Wisej.Web.Ext.ChartJS.OptionsAxisGridLines.Z
member.summary: z-index of gridline layer. Values <= 0 are drawn under datasets, > 0 on top.

member.name: P:Wisej.Web.Ext.ChartJS.OptionsAxisGridLines.ZeroLineBorderDash
member.summary: Length and spacing of dashes of the grid line for the first index (index 0). See https://developer.mozilla.org/en-US/docs/Web/API/CanvasRenderingContext2D/setLineDash.

member.name: P:Wisej.Web.Ext.ChartJS.OptionsAxisGridLines.ZeroLineBorderDashOffset
member.summary: Offset for line dashes of the grid line for the first index (index 0). See https://developer.mozilla.org/en-US/docs/Web/API/CanvasRenderingContext2D/lineDashOffset.

member.name: P:Wisej.Web.Ext.ChartJS.OptionsAxisGridLines.ZeroLineColor
member.summary: Stroke color of the grid line for the first index (index 0).

member.name: P:Wisej.Web.Ext.ChartJS.OptionsAxisGridLines.ZeroLineWidth
member.summary: Stroke width of the grid line for the first index (index 0).

member.summary: Specifies the default alignment for the chart's data labels.

member.summary: Specifies the default anchoring of the data labels.

member.summary: The width of the data label's border.

member.name: P:Wisej.Web.Ext.ChartJS.OptionsDataLabel.Clamp
member.summary: Specifies if the anchor position should be calculated based on the visible geometry of the associated element (i.e. part inside the chart area).

member.name: P:Wisej.Web.Ext.ChartJS.OptionsDataLabel.Clip
member.summary: Specifies if the part of the label which is outside the chart area will be masked.

member.name: P:Wisej.Web.Ext.ChartJS.OptionsDataLabel.Color
member.summary: Color of the data label.

member.name: P:Wisej.Web.Ext.ChartJS.OptionsDataLabel.Offset
member.summary: Specifies the distance (in pixels) to pull the label away from the anchor point.

member.summary: Specifies the opacity of the data labels.

member.summary: Constructs a new instance of the set.
member.param: The that owns this set of options.

member.name: P:Wisej.Web.Ext.ChartJS.OptionsScalesTicks.Max
member.summary: User defined maximum number for the scale, overrides maximum value from data.

member.name: P:Wisej.Web.Ext.ChartJS.OptionsScalesTicks.Min
member.summary: User defined minimum number for the scale, overrides minimum value from data.

member.name: P:Wisej.Web.Ext.ChartJS.OptionsScalesTicks.StepSize
member.summary: User defined fixed step size for the scale.
member.remarks: If set, the scale ticks will be enumerated by multiple of stepSize, having one tick per increment. If not set, the ticks are labeled automatically using the nice numbers algorithm.

member.name: P:Wisej.Web.Ext.ChartJS.OptionsScalesTicks.Padding
member.summary: Padding between the tick label and the axis. Only applicable to horizontal scales.

member.name: P:Wisej.Web.Ext.ChartJS.OptionsScalesTicks.Mirror
member.summary: Flips tick labels around axis, displaying the labels inside the chart instead of outside. Only applicable to vertical scales.

member.name: P:Wisej.Web.Ext.ChartJS.OptionsScalesTicks.Reverse
member.summary: Reverses order of tick labels.

member.name: P:Wisej.Web.Ext.ChartJS.OptionsScalesTicks.Font
member.summary: Font of the tick labels.

member.name: P:Wisej.Web.Ext.ChartJS.OptionsScalesTicks.FontColor
member.summary: Tick labels color.

member.name: P:Wisej.Web.Ext.ChartJS.OptionsScalesTicks.BeginAtZero
member.summary: If true, scale will include 0 if it is not already included.

member.name: T:Wisej.Web.Ext.ChartJS.ScaleType
member.summary: Type of scale being employed.

member.name: F:Wisej.Web.Ext.ChartJS.ScaleType.Linear
member.summary: The linear scale can be used to display numerical data. It can be placed on either the x or y axis. The scatter chart type automatically configures a line chart to use one of these scales for the x axis.

member.name: F:Wisej.Web.Ext.ChartJS.ScaleType.Time
member.summary: The time scale is used to display times and dates. It can be placed on the x axis. When building its ticks, it will automatically calculate the most comfortable unit base on the size of the scale.

member.name: F:Wisej.Web.Ext.ChartJS.ScaleType.Category
member.summary: Labels are drawn in from the labels array included in the chart data.

member.name: F:Wisej.Web.Ext.ChartJS.ScaleType.Logarithmic
member.summary: The logarithmic scale is used to display logarithmic data of course. It can be placed on either the x or y axis.

member.name: F:Wisej.Web.Ext.ChartJS.ScaleType.RadialLinear
member.summary: The radial linear scale is used specifically for the radar chart type.

member.name: T:Wisej.Web.Ext.ChartJS.TimeScaleTimeUnit
member.summary: Configure how different time units are formatted into strings for the axis tick marks.

member.name: F:Wisej.Web.Ext.ChartJS.TimeScaleTimeUnit.millisecond
member.summary: Milliseconds 'SSS [ms]'

member.name: F:Wisej.Web.Ext.ChartJS.TimeScaleTimeUnit.second
member.summary: Seconds 'h:mm:ss a'

member.name: F:Wisej.Web.Ext.ChartJS.TimeScaleTimeUnit.minute
member.summary: Minutes 'h:mmm:ss a'

member.name: F:Wisej.Web.Ext.ChartJS.TimeScaleTimeUnit.hour
member.summary: Hours 'MMM D, hA'

member.name: F:Wisej.Web.Ext.ChartJS.TimeScaleTimeUnit.day
member.summary: Days 'll'

member.name: F:Wisej.Web.Ext.ChartJS.TimeScaleTimeUnit.week
member.summary: Weeks ;ll'

member.name: F:Wisej.Web.Ext.ChartJS.TimeScaleTimeUnit.month
member.summary: Months 'MMM YYYY'

member.name: F:Wisej.Web.Ext.ChartJS.TimeScaleTimeUnit.quarter
member.summary: Quarters '[Q]Q - YYYY'

member.name: F:Wisej.Web.Ext.ChartJS.TimeScaleTimeUnit.year
member.summary: Years 'YYYY'
